title: Amendments to Annex III
summary: Article 7 empowers the European Commission to update Annex III of the EU Artificial Intelligence Act, which lists high-risk AI use cases. The Commission can add or modify high-risk use cases when AI systems in Annex III areas pose risks to health, safety or fundamental rights comparable to or greater than existing high-risk systems. It must consider a detailed set of criteria, including the intended purpose, autonomy of the system, types of data processed, potential harm, dependence and vulnerability of affected persons, reversibility of outcomes, and existing safeguards in EU law. The Commission may also remove use cases from Annex III when they no longer present significant risks, provided that this does not lower the overall protection level for health, safety and fundamental rights.
